definitions.definition: Pan troglodytes , a species of great ape native to the savannas and forests of Africa , and believed by biologists to be the closest extant relative to humans along with the bonobo .
A member of the genus Pan , including the bonobo which was formerly known as the pygmy chimpanzee .

main_definition: Pan troglodytes , a species of great ape native to the savannas and forests of Africa , and believed by biologists to be the closest extant relative to humans along with the bonobo .
secondary_definitions: ( loosely ) A member of the genus Pan , including the bonobo which was formerly known as the pygmy chimpanzee .
